attributes.name: DebugLogging

properties.description:
log payloads received by the store
via `push` or returned from a delete/update/create
operation.
properties.name: LOG_PAYLOADS

properties.description: log remote-state updates to the cache
properties.name: LOG_OPERATIONS

properties.description: log local-state updates to the cache
properties.name: LOG_MUTATIONS

properties.description: log notifications received by the NotificationManager
properties.name: LOG_NOTIFICATIONS

properties.description: log requests issued by the RequestManager
properties.name: LOG_REQUESTS

properties.description:
log updates to requests the store has issued to
the network (adapter) to fulfill.
properties.name: LOG_REQUEST_STATUS

properties.description:
log peek, generation and updates to
Record Identifiers.
properties.name: LOG_IDENTIFIERS

properties.description: log updates received by the graph (relationship pointer storage)
properties.name: LOG_GRAPH

properties.description:
log creation/removal of RecordData and Record
instances.
properties.name: LOG_INSTANCE_CACHE
